Saskatchewan Pride Decal Orange Cup With Green Wheat Sheaf Canoe

Real signs. Real people. Niagara built. Regional Decal – Discover the best regional decal in 2025! Regional Decal now available. Showcase your Saskatchewan heritage with this vibrant vinyl decal featuring an orange cup and a green emblem with a wheat sheaf and canoe. Expertly crafted from premium, weatherproof vinyl, this decal delivers lasting color and superior adhesion on any surface. Premium Durability: Weather-resistant vinyl ensures your decal remains bold and intact, indoors or outdoors. Iconic Saskatchewan Symbols: The orange cup honors the province’s namesake, while the green wheat sheaf and canoe highlight its rich agriculture and waterways. Simple Application: Just peel and stick to laptops, water bottles, car windows, notebooks, coolers, and more—no mess, no fuss. Clean Removal: Enjoy easy, residue-free removal, making this sticker perfect as a gift or for personal use. Celebrate your provincial pride wherever you go with this meaningful, eye-catching Saskatchewan decal—ideal for locals, visitors, and fans alike!
